name: Tale of a Little Guardian
description:
We participated in the LDJam LD46 event, it is a 72hours team-based gamedev competition. Everything you experience in-game (from the coding to level design, art, character design, sound effects, music, etc.) was done from scratch for this project in just 72 hours. No pre-made assets were used. 

Which version to play?

The latest version (1.1 as of now) contains the most up-to-date patches and bugfixes. It will be the most stable and less likely to crash/softlock/frustrate you to play. You can see a list of notable bugfixes in our changelog.

Otherwise, if you want the original, unaltered experience straight out of the 72hours sleep-deprived marathon with most bugs and glitchy code, download the LD46 version.

  • Ending Track
